languages.text: {n}Вы нараспев читаете "Похвалу к бдительности и нетерпимости", и паства прилежно слушает, не забывая повторять за вами последние строки стихов. Эта литания хорошо знакома присутствующим, и вы не испытываете трудностей с выступлением.{/n}

{n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du die Hymne von Wachsamkeit und Intoleranz rezitierst, hört dir die Gemeinde pflichtbewusst zu und spricht dir jeden einzelnen Vers nach. Die Anwesenden sind mit dieser Litanei bestens vertraut und es kostet dich keine Mühe, ihre Worte souverän vorzutragen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du die Hymne von Wachsamkeit und Intoleranz rezitierst, hört dir die Gemeinde pflichtbewusst zu und spricht dir jeden einzelnen Vers nach. Die Anwesenden sind mit dieser Litanei bestens vertraut und es kostet dich keine Mühe, ihre Worte souverän vorzutragen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous récitez l'Hymne à la Vigilance et à l'Intolérance, et l'assemblée vous écoute consciencieusement, répétant scrupuleusement la dernière ligne de chaque verset après vous. Tous connaissent cette litanie sur le bout des doigts, et vous-même n'avez aucun mal à la réciter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous récitez l'Hymne à la Vigilance et à l'Intolérance, et l'assemblée vous écoute consciencieusement, répétant scrupuleusement la dernière ligne de chaque verset après vous. Tous connaissent cette litanie sur le bout des doigts, et vous-même n'avez aucun mal à la réciter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recitas el Himno de la Vigilancia y la Intolerancia, y la congregación te escucha con diligencia, repitiendo siempre el último verso después de ti. Los presentes están bastante familiarizados con la letanía, y te resulta sencillo pronunciar las palabras con aplomo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recitas el Himno de la Vigilancia y la Intolerancia, y la congregación te escucha con diligencia, repitiendo siempre el último verso después de ti. Los presentes están bastante familiarizados con la letanía, y te resulta sencillo pronunciar las palabras con aplomo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは警戒と不寛容の聖歌を朗読する。信徒団はそれに注意深く耳を傾け、あなたの後について各節の最後の言葉を繰り返す。その場にいる者たちはこの祈祷書を熟知しているため、その言葉を正確に唱えることに大した努力を必要としない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは警戒と不寛容の聖歌を朗読する。信徒団はそれに注意深く耳を傾け、あなたの後について各節の最後の言葉を繰り返す。その場にいる者たちはこの祈祷書を熟知しているため、その言葉を正確に唱えることに大した努力を必要としない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你背诵了《警惕与决心礼赞》，所有参加布道的人都认认真真地听着，跟着你重复每一节的最后一行。在场的所有人都很熟悉这篇礼赞，你的话语轻而易举地传达到了所有人心中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyat ve Hoşgörüsüzlük İlahisi'ni okuyorsun ve cemaat ciddiyetle dinliyor, her bir dizenin son sözlerini senin ardından tekrar ediyor. Hâlihazırda burada bulunanlar bu duaya son derece aşina ve sözlerini öz güvenli bir şekilde sarf etmek senin için zor olmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recite the Hymn of Vigilance and Intolerance, and the congregation listens dutifully, making sure to repeat the last line of each verse after you. Those present are well familiar with this litany, and it takes you little effort to deliver its words with aplomb.{/n}
